text:
個人様宅宛の発送の場合はお近くの西濃運輸の営業所・支店をご指定頂き、お引き取りが必要になります。
西濃運輸の営業所・支店をお調べいただけます
個人名様の場合は、会社名のあるお届け先をお知らせください。
送り先に「○○自動車○○様」のように会社名・工場名・店舗名等が入る場合は発送が可能です。
なお、ご住所が会社であっても、会社名の記載が無い場合は個人様としての対応になりますのでご注意ください。
trans:
For shipments addressed to private residences, please specify the nearest Seino Transportation branch/office, where you will need to pick up your package.
You can look up Seino Transportation branches/offices.
If the recipient is an individual, please provide a delivery address that includes a company name.
Shipments are possible if the recipient's information includes a company, factory, or store name, such as "XX Automobile Mr./Ms. XX."
Even if the address is a company, if a company name is not included in the details, the shipment will be treated as addressed to an individual.
